courses.name: Advanced Engineering Mathematics
courses.description: Advanced topics in engineering mathematics including complex analysis, Fourier series, and partial differential equations.

courses.name: Linear Algebra
courses.description: Vector spaces, linear transformations, eigenvalues, and applications to engineering problems.

courses.name: Computer Architecture
courses.description: Computer organization, processor design, memory hierarchy, and I/O systems.

courses.name: Advanced Operating Systems
courses.description: Advanced operating system concepts including distributed systems, security, and virtualization.

courses.name: Software Engineering
courses.description: Software development lifecycle, requirements engineering, design patterns, and project management.

courses.name: Computer Networks
courses.description: Network protocols, architecture, security, and distributed applications.

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Problem solving, knowledge representation, machine learning, and neural networks.

courses.name: Machine Learning
courses.description: Supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning architectures, and practical applications.
